Articles.Content:
Hi, haven't posted much on these forums, but I've recently been doing an AAR (After Action Report) of a career mode run in KSP. I've been sharing this with others, but recently thought of sharing it here as well. The goal has been to make it interesting for people that might not be all that into space programs, or those that are somewhat interested in KSP itself.

 

Here's the link if anyone is interested: http://seacdev.blogspot.com/

 

Any thoughts or criticisms are appreciated. If you like it, don't forget to share!
